name: 2020 (sanitizerz)
description:
A bear decides to destroy an evil. Shoot sanitiser from a mask slingshot to eliminate viruses all while placing pancake bridges down to connect platforms and navigate gaps.

Controls:
Jump: up arrow
Move backwards: left arrow
Move forwards: right arrow 
Shoot: spacebar 
Place bridge: s key

A game for UniJam
Thanks for playing our game!
